subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=1|rs=目00}}

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ま|yomi=k}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=ま|-}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Older, unbound form of {{m|ja|目|tr=me<sub>2</sub>}}. Cognate with {{m|ja|見る|tr=miru||to see}}. Never found in isolation in modern Japanese. Remains as the first syllable of various compounds.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ま}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ま}}

# [[eye]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|目|め}}: an eye (see Etymology 2)
* {{ja-r|睫|まつげ}}: eyelash
* {{ja-r|瞼|まぶた}}: eyelid
* {{ja-r|瞼|まなぶた}}: eyelid
* {{ja-r|前|まえ}}
* {{ja-r|瞬く|またたく}}: to blink, to wink
* {{ja-r|瞬く|まばたく}}: to blink, to wink
* {{ja-r|瞬ぐ|まじろぐ}}: to blink, to wink
* {{ja-r|眼|まなこ}}: eyeball
* {{ja-r|眦|まなじり}}: corner of the eye
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|眼間|まなかい}}: between one's eyes
* {{ja-r|眉|まみえ}}: eyebrow
* {{ja-r|眉|まゆ}}: eyebrow
* {{ja-r|眼差し|まなざし}}: a look, gaze
* {{ja-r|血眼|ちまなこ}}: bloodshot eyes
* {{ja-r|目深|まぶか}}: wearing low over one's eyes
* {{ja-r|団栗眼|どんぐり まなこ}}: goggle-eyes (acorn-eyes)
* {{ja-r|目の当たり|ま の あたり}}: just before one's eyes
* {{ja-r|寝惚け眼|ねぼけ まなこ}}: sleepy eyes
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|め|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Suffix
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|もく|yomi=o}}
From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=もく|-}} {{m|ltc|目}}. [[呉音#Japanese|Go'on]], so likely an older borrowed reading. Compare modern {{cog|yue|-}} reading ''muk<sub>6</sub>'', or modern {{cog|wuu|-}} {{IPAchar|/mʊʔ¹²/}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=goon|もく|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|もく}}

# {{lb|ja|taxonomy|sort=もく}} an [[order]] in [[biology]]: smaller than a [[class]], bigger than a [[family]]
# a [[playing piece]] in a [[board game]], a [[stone]] in the game of [[go]]
# a [[point]] in the game of [[go]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|目%迎|もく%げい}}: turning one's [[gaze]] towards the direction from which someone is coming
* {{ja-r|目%撃|もく%げき}}: [[witness]]ing something
* {{ja-r|目%今|もく%こん}}: also ''mokkon'':
* {{ja-r|目%算|もく%さん}}: [[eyeball]]ing something, making a visual estimate or calculation of something
* {{ja-r|目%視|もく%し}}: [[look]]ing at something with one's own eyes
* {{ja-r|目%次|もく%じ}}: a [[table of contents]]
* {{ja-r|目%笑|もく%しょう}}: [[smile|smiling]] with one's eyes; smiling at one another, catching another's eye and smiling or laughing
* {{ja-r|目%睫|もく%しょう}}: eyes and [[eyelash]]es; extremely close by
* {{ja-r|目%睫 の 間|もく%しょう の かん}}: the space between the eyes and eyelashes; extremely close by
* {{ja-r|目%食 耳視|もく%しょく じし}}: "eating with one's eyes, looking with one's ears" → choosing foods based on what they look like instead of their taste, and choosing fashions based on what people say instead of how comfortable they are → all style and no substance
* {{ja-r|目%銭|もく%せん}}: a kind of [[tax]] levied in the [[w:Kamakura period|Kamakura]] and [[w:Muromachi period|Muromachi period]]s; a tax on [[酒#Japanese|sake]] [[bottle]]s; a [[property]] tax based on the [[area]] of [[agricultural]] land
* {{ja-r|目%前|もく%ぜん}}: right [[before]] one's [[eye]]s, [[right away]], [[imminent]], [[immediate]]
* {{ja-r|目%送|もく%そう}}: [[follow]]ing something or someone with one's eyes
* {{ja-r|目%測|もく%そく}}: [[eyeball]]ing a [[distance]] or [[length]]
* {{ja-r|目%代|もく%だい}}: an [[agent]] or [[executor]] of a lord starting from the late [[w:Heian period|Heian period]]; an on-site [[official]] or [[deputy]] starting from the [[w:Kamakura period|Kamakura period]]; a [[local]] [[administrator]] in the [[w:Edo period|Edo period]]
* {{ja-r|目%的|もく%てき}}: [[intent]], [[purpose]], [[goal]], [[objective]]
* {{ja-r|目%途|もく%と}}: [[mark]], [[guide]], [[target]]
* {{ja-r|目%睹|もく%と}}: uncommon alternative for ''mokugeki'': [[witness]]ing something
* {{ja-r|目%標|もく%ひょう}}: [[target]], [[goal]], [[aim]]; [[landmark]]
* {{ja-r|目%礼|もく%れい}}: [[greet]]ing or [[acknowledge|acknowledging]] someone with one's eyes
* {{ja-r|目%録|もく%ろく}}: a [[list]], a [[catalog]]
* {{ja-r|目%論見|もく%ろみ}}, {{ja-r|目%論|もく%ろみ}}: a [[plan]], a [[scheme]], a [[design]], a [[plot]]
* {{ja-r|目%論む|もく%ろむ}}: to [[plan]], to [[scheme]], to [[design]], to [[plot]]
* {{ja-r|目%割|もく%われ}}: a [[plot]], [[conspiracy]], or other [[hidden]] [[plan]] being [[expose]]d or [[found out]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|細%目|さい%もく}}: [[detail]]s, [[particular]]s, [[breakdown]]
* {{ja-r|真%面%目|しん%めん%もく}}: also ''shinmenboku'': the [[real]] [[appearance]] or [[worth]] of something; [[serious]]
* {{ja-r|新%面%目|しん%めん%もく}}: also ''shinmenboku'': a new [[appearance]] or [[look]] for something
* {{ja-r|不%面%目|ふ%めん%もく}}: alternate reading for ''fumenboku'': [[dishonor]], loss of [[face]]
* {{ja-r|面%目|めん%もく}}: alternate reading for ''menboku'': one's [[honor]], one's metaphorical [[face]]; external [[appearance]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Verb
Conjugation
subSections.text: {{ja-suru|もく}}

subSections.title: Etymology 4
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ぼく}}

subSections.title: Affix
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|瞬%目|しゅん%ぼく}}: the blink of an eye, a moment, an instant
* {{ja-r|真%面%目|しん%めん%ぼく}}: alternate reading for ''shinmenmoku'': the [[real]] [[appearance]] or [[worth]] of something; [[serious]]
* {{ja-r|新%面%目|しん%めん%ぼく}}: alternate reading for ''shinmenmoku'': a new [[appearance]] or [[look]] for something
* {{ja-r|不%面%目|ふ%めん%ぼく}}: also ''fumenmoku'': [[dishonor]], loss of [[face]]
* {{ja-r|面%目|めい%ぼく}}: alternate reading for ''menboku'' (see below)
* {{ja-r|面%目|めん%ぼく}}: also ''menmoku'': one's [[honor]], one's metaphorical [[face]]; external [[appearance]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.text:
